Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures184514.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Representation of a vertex of a graph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Construct a new vertex

      boolean adjacencyCheck(Vertex z)
      Checks whether the vertex is adjacent to vertex z
      protected void createIncidenceSeq()
      Creates the incidence sequence connected with the vertex Sets the array List to an empty sequence This is because no edges at the moment are incident to the vertex

      Get followed edge.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(java.lang.String name)
        Construct a new vertex
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the vertex

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets name of the vertex
        Returns:
        name of the vertex

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the vertex
        Parameters:
        name - the vertex name

      • createIncidenceSeq

        protected void createIncidenceSeq()
        Creates the incidence sequence connected with the vertex Sets the array List to an empty sequence This is because no edges at the moment are incident to the vertex

      • insertIncidentEdge

        public void insertIncidentEdge(Edge e)
        Inserts an edge to the incidence sequence array list.
        Parameters:
        e - an edge

      • removeIncidentEdge

        public boolean removeIncidentEdge(Edge e)
        Removes an edge from the incidence sequence array list. will return true if the edge is removed will return false if the edge is not incident to the vertex.
        Parameters:
        e - an edge
        Returns:
        boolean true or false

      • getIncidentEdges

        public java.util.ArrayList<Edge> getIncidentEdges()
        Retrieves and returns an array list of edges 'incident' to the vertex
        Returns:
        ArrayList

      • valencyOfVertex

        public int valencyOfVertex()
        Returns the valency of the vertex i.e. the number of edges incident to the vertex
        Returns:
        int

      • setAsVisited

        protected void setAsVisited()
        Mark a vertex as visited. Used for traversing to allow for keeping a note of visited vertexes

      • isVisited

        protected boolean isVisited()
        Check whether a vertex has been visited. Helpful when traversing a graph, as can check whether a vertex has been visited.
        Returns:
        true / false

      • getFollowed

        protected Edge getFollowed()
        Get followed edge.
        Returns:
        Edge

      • setFollowed

        protected void setFollowed(Edge f)
        Sets the followed edge. Used to record the edge that was traversed in order to reach the vertex Used in my implementation of BFS traversal
        Parameters:
        f - the edge traversed to reach vertex in a BFS traversal.

      • unvisitVertex

        protected void unvisitVertex()
        Un-visits a vertex. Used to reset the vertex to unvisited Helpful and used before carrying out graph traversal i.e. BFS traversal

      • adjacencyCheck

        public boolean adjacencyCheck(Vertex z)
        Checks whether the vertex is adjacent to vertex z
        Parameters:
        z - a vertex
        Returns:
        boolean
